com.wizzer.mle.parts.stages

Class Mle2dStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleStage
      • com.wizzer.mle.parts.stages.Mle2dStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.stages.I2dStage, com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.IMleStage

    public class Mle2dStage
extends com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleStage
implements com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.stages.I2dStage
    This class implements a simple Stage for 2D applications.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  Mle2dStage.Mle2dStageBlitterTask
      This inner class is used to blit the offscreen buffer to the stage's current Graphics context.
      protected class  Mle2dStage.Mle2dStageResizeCallback
      This inner class is used to process resize events.

      • getSize

        public com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSize getSize()

        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        getSize in class com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleStage
        Returns:
        The size of the stage's component is returned. Magic Lantern 1.0 supports one component per stage: this is the default component size.

      • init

        public void init()
          throws com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException
        Initialize the stage.

        The stage creates an event callback for managing the resize event. It also registers a task with the scheduler for performing double buffering blit of the offscreen buffer to the onscreen buffer.

        Overrides:
        init in class com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleStage
        Throws:
        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the stage can not be successfully initialized.

      • resize

        public void resize(int x,
                   int y,
                   int width,
                   int height)
            throws com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException
        Handle resizing and buffer management.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the raster to resize.
        y - The y position of the raster to resize.
        width - The width of the raster to resize.
        height - The height of the raster to resize.
        Throws:
        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the stage can not be resized.

      • blit

        public void blit(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Blit the offscreen buffer to the specified Graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context to blit to.

      • sizeTo

        public void sizeTo(int width,
                   int height)
        Resize the application Frame to be the size of the specified width and height.

        height - The height to resize the Stage to.
